A call of duty alternative that’s free to play, but there are some bad bits. 

Most of the community is extremely unsupportive of new players. Prepare to get kicked a few times. As others have mentioned, hackers are also everywhere. You can purchase premium for around £10 to avoid some but it’s not a fool proof way. 

I also went into a lobby with a foreign guy shouting “suck my….”

Another lobby was full of Asian music which repeated itself for the whole subsequent match. No straightforward way to mute.


Graphics are good. No kill streaks which makes it so much better than 90% of cod games. 

I would recommend as it is a good decent free play but it’s let down by the toxic player base.
this game is an amazing fps game, i recommend it to anyone who likes a little compition
